text: Woh ladka jab uske saath daud dhoop karne ki umar ko pahunch gaya to ( ek roz) Ibrahim ne ussey kaha, “beta, main khwab mein dekhta hoon ke main tujhey zibaah kar raha hoon, ab tu bata, tera kya khayal hai?” usne kaha, “abbajan , jo kuch aapko hukum diya jaa raha hai usey kar daliye, aap insha Allah mujhey saabiron(sabr karne walon) mein se payenge”
